header: When I Come I Will Not Spare Those Seeking Proof of Christ Speaking In Me

verse: This is the third time I am coming to you. Every word shall be established based-on the mouth of two and three witnesses.

I have said-before and I am saying-beforehand, as being-present the second time and being-absent now, to the ones having previously-sinned and to all the rest— that if I come again I will not spare you,
since you are seeking a proof of Christ speaking in me, Who is not weak toward you, but is strong in you.
For indeed He was crucified because-of weakness, but He lives because-of the power of God. For indeed we are weak in Him, but we will live with Him because of the power of God toward you.

header: Prove Yourselves, That Christ Is In You!

verse: Test yourselves to see if you are in the faith! Prove yourselves! Or do you not know yourselves, that Jesus Christ is in you?— unless indeed you are disapproved.
But I hope that you will come-to-know that we are not disapproved.
And we are praying to God that you may not do anything bad— not in order that we may appear approved, but in order that you may be doing the good, and we may be as disapproved.
For we cannot do anything against the truth, but [only] for the truth.
For we are rejoicing whenever we are weak but you are strong. This also we are praying— your restoration.

header: I Am Writing So I Don’t Have To Act Severely When I Come

verse: For this reason I am writing these things while absent— in order that while being-present, I may not act severely according-to the authority which the Lord gave me for building-up and not for tearing-down.
Finally, brothers, be rejoicing, be restored, be exhorted, be thinking the same thing, be living-in-peace. And the God of love and peace will be with you.
Greet one another with a holy kiss.
The grace of  the Lord Jesus Christ and the love of  God and the fellowship of  the Holy Spirit be with you all.
